content.raw:
The processes are not being properly terminated when the GUI is closed:

1.  `ign gazebo -v 4 -f examples/worlds/empty.sdf`
1.  Close the window
1. This is printed: `Library error: Problem running [gazebo]() from libignition-gazebo2-ign.so.` and the process is still alive.
content.html:
The processes are not being properly terminated when the GUI is closed:

  1. ign gazebo -v 4 -f examples/worlds/empty.sdf
  2. Close the window
  3. This is printed: Library error: Problem running [gazebo]() from libignition-gazebo2-ign.so. and the process is still alive.
